channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: H&R Block Coupons and Deals: 20% Off Tax Prep in 2025
item.description: Save 20% online and when you visit your local H&R Block store. You can save up to $50 when you use one of our (unique) codes.

item.title: Trump and DOGE Defund Program That Boosted American Manufacturing for Decades

item.title: Want to Look at Your Phone Less? Just Cover Your Screen
item.description: An art studio hopes its concept for a phone case that can flip around to cover most of your screen will help cure your screen addiction.

item.title: Fintech Plaid raises $575M at a $6.1B valuation, says it will not go public in 2025
item.description: Plaid, which connects bank accounts to financial applications, has sold about $575 million worth of common stock at a $6.1 billion post-money valuatio...

item.title: Top KitchenAid Promo Codes and Coupons
item.description: Get 50% off select appliances, 15% off most regular-price items, free delivery, and other great savings today on WIRED.

item.title: Y Combinator neobank Djamo raises $17M with 1M users across Francophone Africa

item.title: Space solar startup Aetherflux raises $50M to launch first space demo in 2026
